snippet: The chancellor is under growing political pressure over her migration policy at a time when the Continent is looking for strong leadership....
abstract: German Prime Min Angela Merkel's weakening support and troubles at home reflect threats confronting most European Union countries; issues including migrant crisis and rise of nationalism are expected to overshadow planned summit meeting of 27 European leaders in Slovakia.
lead_paragraph: The chancellor is under growing political pressure over her migration policy at a time when the Continent is looking for strong leadership.

headline.main: Angela Merkel’s Problems in Germany Could Challenge Europe, Too
headline.print_headline: Merkel’s Trouble at Home Ripples Through Europe

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
